mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.bingli_uuid_number as bingliUuidNumber ,a.bingren_id as bingrenId ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.jiancha_time as jianchaTime ,a.bingrenzishu_content as bingrenzishuContent ,a.jianchajieguo_content as jianchajieguoContent ,a.yishengkaifang_content as yishengkaifangContent ,a.yishengjianyi_content as yishengjianyiContent ,a.huafeijine as huafeijine ,a.xiacijiuzhen_time as xiacijiuzhenTime ,a.bingli_types as bingliTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
